action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Rica,

This looks great however I just noticed the hyperlinks in the below paragraphs on PD Warrior have changed. Can you please amend? Thanks, Janina

Please see below:

https://www.royalrehab.com.au/private-hospital/day-rehabilitation-programs/pd_warrior/



I would like it to return to looking like part of the paragraph. E.g. the Physiotherapy page is fine.

https://www.royalrehab.com.au/private-hospital/day-rehabilitation-programs/physiotherapy/

JANINA HIPOLITO​

MARKETING SPECIALIST

D.

02 9808 9373

Hi Janina,

Thanks for submitting your request. Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here is the link:  https://www.royalrehab.com.au/private-hospital/day-rehabilitation-programs/pd_warrior/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hi Heath and team,

Can you please download the attached video and add to the PD Warrior page?
https://www.royalrehab.com.au/private-hospital/day-rehabilitation-programs/pd_warrior/

Please place this centre, just above "The right program for you" and also add in a purple headline:

As seen on Channel 7 News Sydney:

Please include hyperlink to Channel 7 News Sydney: https://7news.com.au/news/sydney

Thank you,
Janina


JANINA HIPOLITO​
MARKETING SPECIALIST
D.
02 9808 9373
E.
 Janina.Hipolito@Royalrehab.com.au
